name: Mercury
description: The smallest and closest planet to the Sun. Its surface is filled with craters and is very hot during the day but very cold at night.

name: Venus
description: The hottest planet in the solar system due to the extreme greenhouse effect. Often called Earth's “sister” planet due to its similar size.

name: Earth
description: Our planet! The only planet known to have life. It has a perfect atmosphere and water in liquid form.

name: Mars
description: The red planet that is the target of human exploration. It has the highest mountains and deepest canyons in the solar system.

name: Jupiter
description: The largest planet in the solar system. Has the Great Red Spot, a storm that has been going on for hundreds of years.

name: Saturn
description: Famous for its beautiful rings made of ice and rock. It has a very low density and can float on water.

name: Uranus
description: A “reclining” planet due to the extreme tilt of its axis (98 degrees). It has a blue-green color due to methane in its atmosphere.

name: Neptune
description: The farthest planet from the Sun. It has the strongest winds in the solar system with speeds of up to 2,100 km/h.
